vehicle.car3D
Class Car3D

java.lang.Object
  vehicle.car3D.Car3D
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, Drawable
public class Car3D
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable, java.awt.event.ActionListener

Represents a 3D car with supplied mechanics for movement in 3d space.

Author:
Artur Vitt
